Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldImpl
    instantiate ComplexField directly instead
    nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.DocIndexerTeiP4
    use DocIndexerTei, which supports (basic) P4 and P5
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexField.addProperty(String)
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexField.addProperty(String, TokenFilterAdder)
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits.clearContext()
    not used, and not the client's concern
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Searcher.concordancesIncludeXmlTags()
    always returns true now
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil.fieldName(String, String)
    replace with either propertyField or bookkeepingField
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil.fieldName(String, String, String)
    replace with either propertyField or bookkeepingField
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil.getAlternative(String)
    use getNameComponents
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql.JavaCharStream.getColumn() 
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.corpusql.JavaCharStream.getColumn() 
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene.CharStream.getColumn() 
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerAbstract.getContentPositionNoStore()
    will be handled differently in the future.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Searcher.getContentStoreDir(File, boolean)
    renamed to openContentStore()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hit.getHit(BLSpans)
    use BLSpans.getHit()
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument.DocResult.getHits()
    inefficient when making concordances. Use getNumberOfHits() or getHits(int max) to retrieve some or all of the hits as needed
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits.getHits()
    Breaks optimizations. Use iteration or window() instead.
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql.JavaCharStream.getLine() 
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.corpusql.JavaCharStream.getLine() 
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene.CharStream.getLine() 
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil.getProperty(String)
    use getNameComponents
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument.DocResults.getResults()
    Breaks optimizations. Use iterator or subList() instead.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.RandomAccessGroup.getSpans()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.Group.getSpans()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hit.hitList(BLSpans)
    use Hits class
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.index(File, boolean)
    recurseSubdirs is now a setting instead of a parameter (defaults to true)
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.index(File, String, boolean)
    recurseSubdirs is now a setting instead of a parameter (defaults to true)
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.indexFileList(File)
    not really used, implement your own if required
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.indexFileList(File, File)
    not really used, implement your own if required
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.indexFileList(List)
    not really used, implement your own if required
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil.isProperty(String, String)
    use getNameComponents()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.IndexStructure.print(PrintStream)
    use version that takes a PrintWriter
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.IndexStructure.ComplexFieldDesc.print(PrintStream)
    nl.inl.util.PropertiesUtil.readFromFile(String)
    use version that takes a File
    nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex.ForwardIndex.retrieveParts(int, int[], int[])
    use retrievePartsInt and getTerms().get(id)
    nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex.ForwardIndex.retrievePartsSortOrder(int, int[], int[], boolean) 
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.setCollator(Collator)
    use Searcher.setDefaultCollator()
    nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex.ForwardIndex.setKeepInMemory(boolean)
    keeping forward index in memory is 'never' a good idea (better to use OS caching)
    nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex.ForwardIndex.setKeepInMemory(boolean, long)
    keeping forward index in memory is 'never' a good idea (better to use OS caching)
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.setMaxDocs(int)
    renamed to setMaxNumberOfDocsToIndex
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer.setProcessZipFilesAsDirectories(boolean)
    renamed to setProcessArchivesAsDirectories()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits.sort(HitProperty...)
    use single HitProperty version, possibly with HitPropertyMultiple
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits.sort(HitProperty[], boolean)
    use single HitProperty version, possibly with HitPropertyMultiple
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil.split(String)
    Not used anywhere, superseded by getNameComponents()
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerAbstract.startCaptureContent()
    pass the field name you're capturing content for
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits.subList(int, int)
    use window()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Searcher.termOccursInIndex(Term)
    moved to LuceneUtil
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument.DocResults.tooManyHits()
    renamed to maxHitsRetrieved()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits.tooManyHits()
    renamed to maxHitsRetrieved()
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.HitsWindow.totalHits()
    use sourceSize() or sourceTotalSize()

    Constructor and Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexField(String, String, TokenFilterAdder)
    use constructor with sensitivity parameter

    use constructor with sensitivity parameter

    use constructor with sensitivity parameter

    use constructor with sensitivity parameter

    use constructor with sensitivity parameter
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldImpl(String, String, TokenFilterAdder, boolean)
    use constructor with sensitivity parameter
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldImpl(String, TokenFilterAdder)
    use constructor with sensitivity parameter
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldImpl(String, TokenFilterAdder, boolean)
    use constructor with sensitivity parameter
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldProperty(String, boolean)
    Use constructor with SensitivitySetting parameter
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldProperty(String, TokenFilterAdder, boolean)
    Use constructor with SensitivitySetting parameter
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits(Searcher, String, Spans)
    supply a SpanQuery to a Hits object instead
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.Indexer(File, boolean, Class, String)
    use version without contents field name
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.ResultsGrouper(Searcher, SpanQuery, HitProperty, String)
    pass a Hits object to ResultsGrouper
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.Searcher(File)
    use Searcher.open(File)
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene.helpers.TPTermRange(String, String, String, boolean, boolean, Collator)
